cases.title: Pathology Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying
cases.description: Defendant's Pathology Expert Witness was excluded from testifying in a jail death case.

cases.title: Police Procedure Expert's Testimony Limited
cases.description: The court ruled plaintiff's Police Procedure Expert Witness could testify on police practices, but not on Fourth Amendment standards.

cases.title: Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Ladder Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify on ladder failure despite not having tested his theories.
